entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
